.mi-slider .l-frame ul li:first-child{margin-left:1.25rem}@media (min-width: 37.56rem){.tile-marketing-4pack .mi-slider .l-frame ul li:first-child,.tile-marketing-5050 .mi-slider .l-frame ul 37.56rem){.tile-marketing-4pack .mi-slider .l-frame ul li:last-of-type,.tile-marketing-5050 .mi-slider .l-frame ul li:last-of-type{margin-right:0}}.tile-marketing-4pack .mi-slider .mi-scrollbar,.tile-marketing-5050 .mi-slider .mi-scrollbar{margin:0 1.25rem}@media (min-width: 37.56rem){.tile-marketing-4pack .mi-slider .mi-scrollbar,.tile-marketing-5050 .mi-slider .mi-scrollbar{margin:0}}.tile-marketing-4pack .t-extend-link .t-icon-arrow-right,.tile-marketing-5050 .t-extend-link .t-icon-arrow-right{line-height:.875rem}.tile-marketing-4pack .is-over-text,.tile-marketing-5050 .is-over-text{padding-bottom:1rem;padding-top:0.80rem}.tile-marketing-4pack .is-over-text p,.tile-marketing-5050 .is-over-text
